implementation.notes: Story 03 is a verification story that validates the complete NIP-17 fix (stories 01+02). Implementation consists of: (1) All story 01 tests pass (13/13), (2) All story 02 tests pass (12/12), (3) No regressions in baseline tests. Manual dual-instance verification per CLAUDE.md protocol should be performed by user using Playwright MCP to confirm end-to-end message delivery with randomized timestamps.

verification_status.notes: Automated unit and integration tests verify the implementation is correct. Full dual-instance end-to-end testing with Playwright MCP (make dev-dual) should be performed to confirm message delivery in production-like environment.
